title: My manor
description: In the 60's Charlie Richardson's manor was a hugely profitable empire stretching from South London scrapyards and West End drinking clubs to mining in South Africa. Then, on the brink of the most lucrative deal of his career, Richardson was arressted. After a trial where the press labelled him the "Torture Gang Boss" and the judge sentenced him a disgrace to society, he was sentenced to 25 yrs in prison. Now the gangland legend tells his own story....
author: Charlie Richardson
